sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If \(x : y = 2 : 7 \), then find \((8 x + 6 y ):(8 x + 7 y )\)\

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": " 
 It is given that $x : y = 2 : 7$ \\We need to find the value of \\ $$ \frac{8x+6y}{8x+7y} $$.
 "}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$= \frac{\frac{8x}{y} + \input[s2v1]{}}{\frac{8x}{y} + \input[s2v2]{}} $$
 "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$= \frac{ 8 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{}}{7}\right) + 6}{8\left(\frac{2}{\input[s3v2]{}}\right) + 7 } $$
 "}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$= \frac{\frac{16 + 42 }{\input[s4v1]{}}}{\frac{16 + 49}{7}}$$ \\ $$= \frac{16 + \input[s4v2]{}}{16 + 49 }$$
 "}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 $$= \frac{\input[s5v1]{}}{\input[s5v2]{}} $$\\So, the answer is $58 : 65 $. 
 "}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " $$ Please refer back to the question $$ 
 "}, {"data": [6, 7], "text": " $$ Dividing numerator and denominator by y, we get the given expression.$$ 
 "}, {"data": [2, 7], "text": " $$ Substitute the given ratio of $ x:y=2:7 $ $$ 
 "}, {"data": [7, 42], "text": " 
 $$ Simplify the expression by arithmetic operations$$ 
 "}, {"data": [58, 65], "text": " 
 Upon further simplification we got the following answer."}]
